reviewText: My son and daughter love this DVD.
Overall, a great video to help with learning teen numbers :) Not sure why she picked the wording for number 20.
My kids love this songs, movements and a music. The songs are very catchy yet quick. My kids are really learning their numbers in a fun way!!
DVD is very boring and numbers do not play continuously.  You must select each individual number and each number plays less than a minute.  Very poor.....do not waste your money on this DVD!
This is our third Heidi video. My little ones love her stuff!
My K class loved the songs and movement.
I am a VPK Teacher and during transition time I play this DVD and our class loves it!! Very engaging, sight words 1 as well.

I have used this before. After more than 2 years of constant use my originals were worn out. Reordered and even more enjoyable since Heidi added color and counting 10 frames to her program. My young students enjoy the DVD very much and I use it is a good low impact for bad weather days as well.
